ISSUE.TITLE: Unusual behaviour in schema browser
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue Summary When expanding a table in the schema browser and scrolling to the bottom of the table the schema browser resets to the top. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Identify a table with many columns 2. Expand the table and witness odd behaviour when scrolling to the bottom of the table columns ![schemabrowser](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7199904/18049777/a1b9ba16-6e2d-11e6-96f6-98505c94f52e.gif) NOTE: I can reproduce this on my instance and on demo.redash.io ### Technical details: - Redash Version: 0.12.0+b2163 - Browser/OS: Chrome/Mac OS - How did you install Redash: Amazon AMI

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix: schema browser was unstable after opening a table (closes #1261)
